articles.title: Womanizer Vibrator review: Revolutionary sex toy that's ‘whisper-quiet'
articles.author: Ebony Leigh
articles.summary: Womanizer has launched the Vibe, a 'whisper-quiet' clitoral vibrator featuring noiseless motor and UltraWave Vibration technology, designed for discreet and dynamic pleasure. The Vibe is ergonomically crafted with 'Pleasure Edges' for targeted stimulation and offers 10 intensity levels and three Autopilot modes. It is available in three colors, priced at $210.

articles.title: Would you use Google Gemini if it fills with ads?
articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz
articles.summary: Google is considering introducing advertising to its Gemini AI platform, potentially through native ad concepts similar to those used in Google's AI Overviews. CEO Sundar Pichai indicated that while Gemini currently offers free and subscription tiers, advertising will likely be integrated to boost revenue, following a strategy similar to YouTube. Other companies, like Microsoft and Amazon, are also exploring advertising within their AI chatbots.

articles.title: Meta's AI transparency effort introduces ad content labels
articles.author: Karabo Ledwaba
org: Reuters Institute for the Study of Journalism
articles.summary: Meta is introducing new AI labels for ad images and videos created or significantly altered using its generative AI tools.  These labels, which began rolling out last year and will expand through 2025, will appear in the three-dot menu or next to the 'Sponsored' label, depending on the AI's role.  Meta also plans to introduce additional measures, including labeling ads generated or modified by third-party AI tools.

articles.title: Shoppers say this Bethenny Frankel-approved cleanser is 'great for mature skin'
articles.summary: Shiseido's cleanser is praised by Bethenny Frankel and Amazon shoppers for its moisturizing and gentle formula. The product, available on Amazon, receives positive reviews for effectively removing impurities without drying the skin, making it suitable even for mature skin.

articles.title: OpenAI eyes the wearables business: Robots, headsets, watches and a whole lot more
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: OpenAI has filed a trademark application that suggests a potential expansion into the hardware market. The filing includes a range of wearable devices, such as earphones, headphones, smart watches, and virtual and augmented reality headsets, indicating a move beyond their current software offerings.

articles.title: Technology that changed us: The 2000s, from iPhone to Twitter
articles.author: David Gewirtz
articles.summary: Google AdWords revolutionized online advertising by introducing a performance-based model. Apple iPod provided unprecedented storage capacity, accelerating the shift towards a mobile-first environment for music consumption. Both product introductions significantly impacted their respective industries.

articles.title: I tested MSI's new Windows handheld and would consider it over a gaming laptop
articles.author: Cesar Cadenas
articles.summary: MSI's Claw 8 AI+ gaming handheld is available for pre-order through MSI's online store and Amazon for $899. The new model addresses issues of the previous generation with an upgraded design including an eight-inch FHD+ touchscreen running at a 120Hz refresh rate.

articles.title: The best twin mattress sales in February 2025
articles.summary: Casper is offering its new all-foam mattress with a medium-firm feel. Nectar is providing a discount on its Original memory foam mattress. DreamCloud has a Premier Rest Hybrid Mattress with a foam support layer and pillow top. Bear offers its Star Hybrid mattress with six layers of foam and spring coils. Leesa is featuring the Sapira Hybrid Mattress with edge support and the Sapira Chill Hybrid with phase-change material. Big Fig has the Classic Mattress designed for heavier individuals, Saatva offers the Classic Mattress with a plush top and the Loom & Leaf Mattress, and GhostBed provides the Luxe Mattress, a memory foam option.

articles.title: This portable washer has saved me time and money — I can't recommend it enough
articles.author: Vivien Moon
articles.summary: The Black+Decker Portable Washing Machine is reviewed, highlighting its quiet operation, multiple cycles, and portability.  The review also includes information about a companion dryer and dolly, noting their features and benefits. The Black+Decker Portable Washer provides option for various cycles and includes a lint catcher.

articles.title: A Smoky, Salty Perfume That Lasts for 24 Hours
articles.author: Iva Dixit
articles.summary: Matiere Premiere's Vanilla Powder is a perfume known for its extreme longevity, described as 'beast mode' by fragrance enthusiasts. Created by Aurélien Guichard, it is characterized by its strong, lasting scent that persists even after washing or exposure to various environments, making it a notable product in the fragrance market.

articles.title: Google Drive doesn't let you customize your brand's cloud storage, but hits white-label platform does
articles.author: Deal Post Team
articles.summary: Cloudbrand launched a white-label cloud storage platform, allowing businesses to customize cloud storage with their own branding and logos. This new service aims to replace Google Drive, focusing on improving first impressions for clients through enhanced brand visibility.

articles.title: After A Year of Waiting, Ilia's Eyeshadow Sticks are (Almost) Available—and I Reviewed Them
articles.author: Beth Gillette
articles.summary: Ilia is launching the revamped Ilia Eye Stylus Shadow Stick on February 19, featuring 20 shades inspired by Renaissance oil paintings. The product, available at Sephora.com and IliaBeauty.com, has been reformulated and repackaged based on feedback from beauty editors, promising a waterproof, sweatproof, and crease-resistant wear with a vegan and cruelty-free formula.

articles.title: It's Now Even Easier to Use ChatGPT Search as a Google Replacement
articles.author: Brent Dirks
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new feature for ChatGPT Search, allowing users to access it without logging in or creating an account on the desktop site. This update aims to make the search process easier and more accessible, potentially attracting new users and subscribers.

articles.title: Amazon has Stanley's newest Quencher color drop in stock, and you can snag these tumblers ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Stanley launched a new color collection for its Quencher Tumblers and leakproof Quencher ProTour Tumblers. These products are available for purchase on Amazon.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series: AI-Powered Content Creation Made Easy
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Indonesia has launched the Galaxy S25 series, a smartphone lineup designed to enhance content creation through AI. The series features an advanced camera system with a 50MP ultrawide lens, improved noise cancellation technology, and AI-powered portrait photography enhancements. The Galaxy S25 series also offers manual controls and seamless integration with other Samsung services.

articles.title: The best cordless stick vacuums for 2025, tested and reviewed
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares various cordless stick vacuums, including models from Dyson (V8, V11, Outsize, V15 Detect, gen5Detect), Tineco (Pure One S15 Pet), Shark (Rocket Pet Pro), Bissell (IconPet), and Hoover (OnePwr Blade+). The reviews focus on factors like suction power, run time, dust cup capacity, weight, brush types, and suitability for different floor types and pet hair removal, highlighting the features of the new models and updates made to the existing models.

articles.title: Amazon has Dyson's blush pink Supersonic Nural for 1 cent shy of its best price ever, and you can get it fast with Prime
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Dyson Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer in Strawberry Bronze and Blush Pink for $399, a significant reduction from $500. This model includes features like Scalp Protect Mode and Attachment Learning, which personalizes settings based on the attachments used.

articles.title: Dyson sale knocks £100 off one of its most highly reviewed vacuums
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: The Dyson V8 Advanced vacuum cleaner features three power modes and includes multiple brush heads for versatile cleaning. It boasts a 40-minute runtime, suitable for smaller homes, and customer reviews highlight its improved performance over previous models like the V6. Shark also offers a similar vacuum model.

articles.title: Gloo Launches New Open Source Initiative To Drive Rapid Innovation of Values-Aligned AI
articles.author: Gloo
articles.summary: Gloo launched a new open-source initiative. This initiative aims to drive rapid innovation.

articles.title: WIN: The ultimate prize pack from Amaysim!
articles.author: Samantha Elliott
articles.summary: Amaysim is running a '$50 million in amayzing surprises competition' until May 6, 2025, offering over 1.6 million prizes. Participants who sign up for a new or renew their existing Amaysim mobile plan have a chance to win, including a grand prize package with Nbn internet and a new phone.

articles.title: Apple, Samsung turn to thin phones to lure upgraders
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Apple is rumored to be preparing the iPhone 17 Air, a big-screen phone with a skinny frame, to replace the Plus model. Samsung briefly mentioned the Galaxy S25 Edge, a skinny phone model, during the S25 lineup unveiling, with its release planned for this year.

articles.title: Start, monitor and adjust laundry from your phone with Miele
articles.author: Aiden Daries
articles.summary: Miele South Africa has launched its W1T1 washer-dryer range, featuring the TwinDos automated detergent dispensing system and CapDosing for delicate fabrics. The range also incorporates EcoSpeed technology to reduce water and energy consumption. Users can remotely control the washer-dryer via the Miele app using WiFiConn@ct technology.

articles.title: Moccona, Nescafe or Bushells? Good Food's instant coffee taste test
articles.author: Bianca Hrovat
articles.summary: Stitch Coffee founder Nawar Adra highlights the incentive for consumers to buy specialty instant coffee to support sustainable coffee farming and drive prices down. The article presents a taste test of instant coffee options with Veneziano Specialty Instant Coffee emerging as the winner. Illy Instant Intenso, purchased from IGA, ranks highly, offering the best value.

articles.title: Karnataka High Court to roll out new video conferencing platform from February 10
articles.author: DHNS
articles.summary: Vconsol released a video conferencing platform. The platform aims to provide seamless online appearance to the users.

articles.title: Looking for a new mattress? Here's why Boring Mattress is the way to go
articles.author: Camryn La Sala
articles.summary: Boring Mattress Co. launched the Boring Hybrid Mattress, a 10-inch mattress featuring responsive foams and motion-reducing springs, available in sizes twin to California king, starting at $599. The company provides a 365-night sleep trial and allows free mattress exchange within three years if support is lost, along with a 10-year limited warranty. Boring Mattress Co. also sells pillows and foam mattress toppers.

articles.title: Nexscient(R) Signs LOI for Acquisition of Generative AI Application
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Nexscient, Inc. has signed a Letter of Intent to acquire AI Media Toolkit. This acquisition is aimed at enhancing Nexscient's capabilities in providing enterprise solutions with cutting-edge artificial intelligence, marking a potential expansion of their product or service offerings.

articles.title: Gratitude for gadgets and innovations
articles.author: DEB WUETHRICH
articles.summary: The article reflects on various gadgets and innovations that make life easier. It mentions products such as the Insta-pot, and a battery-operated whipper for coffee creamer, as well as a 'Stealth Angel Outdoor & Urban Survival' gadget, exploring their utility and user-friendliness. The author also describes the experience with these products.

articles.title: Presidents Day mattress sales are live! Save up to $948 at Saatva, Nectar, Mattress Firm
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Several mattress companies, including Saatva, Nectar, Serta, Tuft & Needle, Tempur-Pedic, Cocoon by Sealy, Casper, Nolah, Purple, and Avocado Green, are offering discounts for Presidents' Day. Deals include options like the DreamCloud Hybrid Queen Mattress. These sales aim to provide options for various sleep preferences and budgets.

articles.title: Presidents Day mattress sales are live! Save up to $948 at Saatva, Nectar, Mattress Firm
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Several mattress companies, including Saatva, Nectar, Serta, Tuft & Needle, Tempur-Pedic, Cocoon by Sealy, Casper, Nolah, Purple, and Avocado Green, are offering discounts on mattresses during Presidents Day weekend. The mattresses vary in type, such as hybrid, memory foam, and latex, and cater to different sleeping preferences and needs. Features like trial periods, white glove delivery, old mattress removal, and robust warranties are also highlighted for consumers considering a new mattress purchase.

articles.title: Presidents Day mattress sales are live! Save up to $948 at Saatva, Nectar, Mattress Firm
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Saatva, Nectar, Serta, Tuft & Needle, Tempur-Pedic, Cocoon by Sealy, Casper, Nolah, Purple, and Avocado are offering discounts on their mattresses for Presidents Day weekend. The sale includes various mattress types like hybrid, memory foam, and latex, catering to different sleep preferences. These companies also offer services like trial periods, white-glove delivery, old mattress removal, and warranties to improve customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Presidents Day mattress sales are live! Save up to $948 at Saatva, Nectar, Mattress Firm
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Several mattress brands, including Saatva, Nectar, DreamCloud, Serta, Tuft & Needle, Tempur-Pedic, Cocoon by Sealy, Casper, Nolah, Purple, and Avocado Green, are offering deals for Presidents Day. These deals aim to provide different types of sleepers with comfortable and affordable options. Considerations when purchasing a mattress include trial period, white glove delivery, old mattress removal, warranty, customer reviews, and return policy.

articles.title: Presidents Day mattress sales are live! Save up to $948 at Saatva, Nectar, Mattress Firm
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Several mattress brands, including Saatva, Nectar, Serta, Tuft & Needle, Tempur-Pedic, Cocoon by Sealy, Casper, Nolah, Purple, Avocado Green, and DreamCloud are offering discounts for Presidents Day weekend. These mattresses cater to various sleeper preferences, from luxurious hybrid options to budget-friendly memory foam choices.

articles.title: Traffic stop leads to discovery of firearm, one arrest in Norwalk
articles.author: Justin Muszynski
articles.summary: A major CT company is introducing a new logo and changing its name. This rollout signifies an update or refresh of the company's branding.

articles.title: Team India's new jerseys unveiled ahead of WTC Final; fans go gaga over 'Real Madrid-like' Test shirt
articles.summary: Adidas India unveiled the new Indian Cricket Team Jersey for ODI, T20I, and Test formats. This marks the official introduction of the new jersey design.

articles.title: OpenAI's rebrand tries to tap into the emotional side of AI
articles.author: Hunter Schwarz
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a rebrand that includes a tweaked 'blossom' logo, a new 'point' mark, and a new typeface called OpenAI Sans. The rebrand was completed to unify the company's visual identity and imbue a sense of humanity into its technology. Furthermore, OpenAI announced Deep Research, a tool designed to analyze and synthesize research, providing comprehensive reports.

articles.title: Interest rates: Why have they been cut and what does it mean?
articles.author: Henry Saker-Clark
articles.summary: TUI offers £200 off bookings over £2000 with a voucher code. ASOS provides a 10% discount on first orders above £20 using a promo code. Cult Beauty features a 15% discount on orders £25+. Travelodge gives 5% off bookings with a discount code, and Currys has a tablet sale with at least 30% off, including iPads.

articles.title: Want voice search on Meesho? Here's a simple guide
articles.summary: Meesho enhances the shopping experience by enabling voice search on Android devices using Google's voice recognition. Users with Android version five or higher can update the Google app and use voice commands by tapping the microphone icon or enabling 'Ok Google' for hands-free functionality. This feature allows users to trigger searches by saying "on Meesho," displaying relevant results within the app.

articles.title: I tried every frozen appetizer I could find at Aldi. Almost all of them would be worth buying for a party.
articles.author: Ted Berg
articles.summary: Aldi offers a wide selection of frozen appetizers at reasonable prices. The author tested 18 different appetizers, including the Appetitos Buffalo-style chicken dip, Fusia chicken egg rolls, Appetitos breaded cheese curds, and cheese-stuffed pretzels, and ranked them based on their taste.

articles.title: 'We've lost absolutely everything': London mother tells of devastation over house fire 'caused by e-scooter'
articles.author: Megan Howe
articles.summary: TUI offers £200 off bookings over £2000. ASOS provides 10% off first orders above £20. Cult Beauty discounts orders by 15% for purchases over £25. Travelodge offers a 5% discount on bookings and Currys has a tablet sale with at least 30% off, including iPads.

articles.title: Tineco Floor One S5 vacuum review: Cleans floors in a flash
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Tineco has launched the Floor One S5, a cordless wet-dry vacuum cleaner. The Floor One S5 features two cleaning modes: automatic and max and cleans different surfaces. The vacuum has a self-cleaning setting and uses tap water.

articles.title: Tineco Floor One S5 vacuum review: Cleans floors in a flash
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Tineco introduced the Floor One S5 Cordless Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner. This product aims to alleviate the burden of mopping.

articles.title: Tineco Floor One S5 vacuum review: Cleans floors in a flash
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Tineco launched the Floor One S5 Cordless Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner, a cordless, battery-powered device with a 35-minute runtime. The Floor One S5 features iLoop Smart Sensor Technology to adjust suction and has both automatic and max cleaning modes. It also includes a self-cleaning function.

articles.title: Rocky's new Saskatoon location brings its full selection of natural products to Saskatchewan
articles.summary: Rocky Mountain Soap Co. is launching its first store in Saskatchewan, located in Saskatoon's Midtown Mall. The grand opening event on February 8, 2025, will showcase their full line of natural face, body, and hair care products, including a sensorial sink-side hand care treatment. This new store reflects Rocky's evolved vision, refreshed branding, and enhanced customer experience.

articles.title: Rocky's new Saskatoon location brings its full selection of natural products to Saskatchewan
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Rocky has opened a new store in Saskatoon, marking the first in-store opportunity for customers to explore their full range of natural products. The store features refreshed branding, an enhanced customer experience, and a design emphasizing a connection to nature.

articles.title: Rocky's new Saskatoon location brings its full selection of natural products to Saskatchewan
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Rocky Mountain Soap Co. is launching its first Saskatchewan location with a grand opening event at Saskatoon's Midtown Mall on February 8, 2025. The event welcomes customers for a hands-on experience.

articles.title: Exotec Launches Next Generation of Skypod System, an All-in-One Robot-Based AS/RS, that Addresses the Majority of Processes Within a Warehouse
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Exotec, a warehouse robotics provider, announced the commercial launch of the Next Generation of Skypod system. The new system features higher performance, improved storage density, and advanced software features. This launch aims to offer enhanced warehouse automation solutions.

articles.title: Wonderful Seedless Lemons Showcase How 'Lemons With Seeds Are Annoying' in First-Ever National ...
articles.author: Wonderful Seedless Lemons
articles.summary: Wonderful Seedless Lemons has launched its first-ever national, multi-million-dollar marketing campaign. The company is introducing Wonderful Seedless Lemons to consumers, offering a seedless lemon option.

articles.title: OpenAI's Google Search rival, ChatGPT Search, now available for everyone
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT search to the public, eliminating the login requirement. Users can access it directly through chatgpt.com, where the AI assistant provides web-sourced answers with cited references using a fine-tuned version of GPT-4o. This rollout began with paid subscribers in October 2024 and expanded to free account holders in December 2024.

articles.title: Exotec Launches Next Generation of Skypod System, an All-in-One Robot-Based AS/RS, that Addresses the Majority of Processes Within a Warehouse
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Exotec has commercially launched its Next Generation Skypod system. The new system features a more compact Skypod robot, a workstation for robot-to-robot picking, high-throughput Exchanger, and denser storage, improving throughput and storage density. It supports both each and case picking and natively supports value-added logistics features.

articles.title: Sky beats Samsung by handing out £219 accessory for free
articles.author: Chris Hall
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 family, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy and Galaxy AI capabilities. Sky Mobile offers the Galaxy S25 on a 36-month contract and bundles the Galaxy Buds 3 Pro, valued at £219, with the phone.

articles.title: Old Spice at Super Bowl LIX
articles.author: 공탈출 행정학
articles.summary: Old Spice launched its new aluminum-free Total Body Dry Feel Deodorant. The deodorant is sweat-absorbing and provides 24/7 freshness for the entire body. Cam Jordan is partnering with Old Spice to promote the new product.

articles.title: Asus Zenfone 12 Ultra launched, offers Snapdragon 8 Elite with great camera specs
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Asus has launched the Zenfone 12 Ultra smartphone in Europe, Taiwan and Hong Kong, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, up to 16GB RAM, and a 512GB UFS 4.0 storage. The smartphone showcases a Sony Lytia-700 sensor, a 6.78' OLED display with 1-120Hz refresh rate, and a 5500mAh battery with 65W wired and 15W wireless charging and comes with Android 15.

articles.title: Bio-D's Cotton Fresh Range Receives Industry Recognition for Superior Performance
articles.author: Arnold Kitson
articles.summary: Bio-D's Cotton Fresh Laundry Liquid, priced at £24.99 for 5L, has demonstrated outstanding results in independent testing for colour retention and whiteness preservation. This eco-friendly product comes in 100% recycled packaging and is available in various sizes, including refill options. It is manufactured in Hull using solar energy and distributed through Bio-D's network and website.

articles.title: The New A-List Collection From TRESemmé Is Taking Over New York Fashion Week -- Luxury Styling for Anyone in Their Dream Hair Era
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: A company is launching the 'A-List Collection', described as 'Elevated Essentials for Everyday Indulgence', at New York Fashion Week. This collection is positioned as a treatment to improve hair quality.

articles.title: The 5 Best Bread Makers, Tested & Reviewed (2025)
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Convenient bread machines offer an alternative to store-bought bread, allowing users to bake homemade loaves.

articles.title: BrandSpark Best New Product Awards 2025
articles.summary: The BrandSpark Best New Product Awards 2025, in partnership with Newsweek, recognized numerous new products across 86 categories based on feedback from over 10,000 American shoppers. Winners included Dove's Hydration Boost Serum Body Wash, Shark Ninja Clean & Empty Cordless Vacuum, and STōK's Cold Brew Cappuccino, alongside various food, beverage, household, and personal care items from brands like Bob's Red Mill, White Claw, Aldi, and more. These awards highlight standout innovations determined by product appeal, superiority, and repurchase intent.

articles.title: Hellmann's launched a new mayonnaise...fragrance?
articles.author: CBC Radio
articles.summary: Hellmann's has launched a new fragrance called "Will Levis #8," inspired by the scent of its mayonnaise. This product was developed in collaboration with Tennessee Titans quarterback Will Levis and an unnamed perfumer, combining notes of lemon, coffee, musk, vanilla, and a "mayonnaise accord."

articles.title: Casper Canada's Wave Hybrid Snow Wins Product of the Year 2025 in Mattress-in-a-Box Category
articles.author: Casper Canada
articles.summary: Casper Canada's Wave Hybrid Snow mattress has been awarded Product of the Year 2025 in the Mattress-in-a-Box category, based on a Kantar survey. The Wave Hybrid Snow mattress is Casper's most innovative mattress, designed to keep users cool, provide optimal spine alignment, and offer maximum comfort with three firmness options.

articles.title: ⚡Meta-Owned WhatsApp May Soon Allow Users To Create New Communities From Chats Tab on Android
articles.summary: WhatsApp is testing a new feature on Android. The feature will allow users to create new communities directly from the chats tab. This aims to improve user experience and accessibility.

articles.title: KITCHENAID UNVEILS ITS 2025 COLOUR OF THE YEAR: BUTTER - THE COLOUR THAT IS PROVEN TO EVOKE NOSTALGIA Français
articles.author: Whirlpool Canada LP
articles.summary: KitchenAid has launched 'Butter,' its 2025 Colour of the Year, for the Artisan Stand Mixer. This soft, energizing yellow with a creamy, satin finish aims to evoke feelings of warmth and nostalgia. The Artisan Stand Mixer in 'Butter' is now available on KitchenAid.ca.

articles.title: Shoppers snap up budget-friendly earphones that 'rival Apple AirPods' for just £20 on Amazon
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Soundcore A30i Earbuds, a competitor to Apple AirPods, are available on Amazon for £19.99, featuring noise-cancelling, composite diaphragms, 3D surround sound via the Soundcore app, and up to 15 hours of playtime with the charging case. Amazon is also selling Soundcore P20i True Wireless Earbuds for £15.99.

articles.title: 'Powerful' cordless pressure washer for patios and cars now less than £60
articles.author: Stephanie Colderick
articles.summary: Yimbly is offering the Garden Force Jet Hawk Cordless Portable Pressure Washer for £59.99. The cordless pressure washer features water siphoning technology and a 45-minute battery life. Argos offers the Spear and Jackson Cordless Pressure Cleaner, while Amazon lists the Bamboosang 21V High Pressure Washer.

articles.title: You can now use ChatGPT web search without logging in
articles.author: Paul Sawers
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Search, a service designed to compete with Google by providing real-time query support. Initially exclusive to premium subscribers, it then expanded to all signed-in users. Currently, OpenAI now allows anyone to use ChatGPT web search without logging in via ChatGPT.com.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers can now 'smell like Gucci' for £7 with three new perfumes
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi is launching three new botanical fragrances under its Lacura beauty brand, inspired by Gucci Flora range. These perfumes, named Blush Bouquet, Meadow Bouquet and Spring Bouquet, are priced at £6.99 each. Aldi is also re-releasing fan favorite scents inspired by Prada, Giorgio Armani and Tom Ford.

articles.title: Aldi's latest perfume is 'identical' to Gucci's £135 Flora but only costs £7
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi is launching three new botanical fragrances under its Lacura beauty brand, inspired by Gucci Flora, priced at £6.99 each. Additionally, Aldi is re-releasing popular fragrances inspired by brands like Prada, Giorgio Armani, and Tom Ford, with prices starting from £5.99.

articles.title: 'Powerful' blender makes smoothies 'in five seconds' now on sale
articles.author: Phoebe Barton Lifestyle
articles.summary: Nutribullet has launched the Nutribullet Ultra, a powerful 1200W blender with enhanced blade performance and an illuminated interface, now available on Yimbly for £129.99. This model features two blending options, a rapid extractor blade, quieter operation, and comes with two cups and a 'to-go' lid. Shoppers are loving the appliance that makes smoothies 'in five seconds'.

articles.title: XNow Growing Its B2B, B2C Client Roster - San Diego Business Journal
articles.author: Karen Pearlman
articles.summary: ExperienceNow Inc. (XNow) is launching SponsorX, a new feature that uses verification technology to enhance product sponsorships. XNow focuses on offering exclusive discounts for specific groups on travel, hotels, car rentals, and event tickets. Furthermore, restaurants are soon launching on XNow, expanding its service offerings.

articles.title: The Hartford Unveils Refreshed Brand With Modernized Stag Logo
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: The Hartford launched a new brand with a refreshed logo, color palette, and typography. As part of this launch, several business segments were renamed: Commercial Lines to Business Insurance, Personal Lines to Personal Insurance, and Group Benefits to Employee Benefits.

articles.title: Council Post: Lessons On Inclusivity, Pricing And Global Scalability
articles.author: Mohammad Bahareth
articles.summary: Apple launched Vision Pro, which raises questions about inclusivity, pricing strategy and scalability. Companies should prioritize accessibility in their products and services. A dual-tier pricing strategy can help cater to both high-end users and a broader audience. Integration with existing offerings is key for businesses launching breakthrough products.

articles.title: Zapper launches ‘My Cards' to accelerate loyalty in South Africa
articles.author: cajnews
articles.summary: Zapper has launched 'My Cards', a new feature allowing users to digitize and manage loyalty cards from retailers such as Woolworths, Checkers, Dis-Chem, and Pick n Pay within the Zapper app. This mobile-first solution aims to simplify loyalty program participation and provide a more efficient way for consumers to manage rewards, ultimately driving repeat business for retailers.

articles.title: Zara fans convinced one fragrance smells like YSL perfume that's 6 times pricier
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Zara has introduced "Golden Decade" perfume, priced at £22.99 (currently discounted to £15.99), as an affordable alternative to Yves Saint Laurent's "Libre Intense". Zara's perfume has a scent profile that features a white floral bouquet enhanced by mandarin and rounded off with sweet and addictive lavender. The perfume is described as 'A warm, elegant and enveloping eau de parfum for a woman who wants to convey a sense of freedom and express her emotions to the fullest.'

articles.title: New Creative Fabrica's Font Generator: A Better Approach to Typography
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Creative Fabrica has launched an AI-powered Font Generator, a new service that simplifies font creation for designers, marketers, educators, and hobbyists. This tool allows users to generate and export fully functional, high-quality typefaces with customization options for various design needs, without replicating existing fonts.

articles.title: Zomato Rebrands As Eternal Following Board Approval
articles.author: Sentinel Digital Desk
articles.summary: Zomato launched 'Food Rescue' in November 2024. This new feature allows the company to sell cancelled orders at a discounted price within a 3-km radius, available for a limited time to ensure food freshness.

articles.title: Zoftware simplifies software selection with AI-powered innovation
articles.summary: Zoftware has launched the world's first AI-driven software marketplace, simplifying software selection for businesses. The platform features an AI Tech Support Voice Agent, providing real-time troubleshooting and assistance for over 100,000 applications. Zoftware aims to lead the next wave of AI-driven transformation.

articles.title: List of 70+ Popular Indian Brands and Their Taglines: HDFC, Reliance, Amul And More
articles.summary: Several Indian brands are recognized by taglines associated with their marketing of their products. Amul promotes its dairy products with "The Taste of India," while Pepsi uses "Yehi hain right choice baby." Thumbs Up sells excitement with "Taste The Thunder" and Surf Excel cleverly promotes the positive aspects of stains through "Daag Acche Hain."

articles.title: Introducing Byte by Yum!™, an AI-Driven Restaurant Technology Platform Powering Customer and Team Member Experiences Worldwide
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Yum! Brands introduced Byte by Yum!, a new SaaS AI-driven platform designed to improve customer experiences, streamline operations, and empower teams across KFC, Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, and Habit Burger & Grill restaurants globally. The platform includes online and mobile app ordering, point of sale, kitchen and delivery optimization, and inventory and labor management and team member tools. Taco Bell, Pizza Hut and KFC are using Byte by Yum! to improve guest experiences and operational efficiency.

articles.title: Introducing Byte by Yum!™, an AI-Driven Restaurant Technology Platform Powering Customer and Team Member Experiences Worldwide
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Yum! Brands introduced Byte by Yum!, a suite of AI-driven SaaS products. This platform aims to streamline operations and improve customer experiences at KFC, Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, and Habit Burger & Grill restaurants. The Byte by Yum! platform includes online and mobile app ordering, point of sale, kitchen and delivery optimization, menu management, inventory and labor management, and team member tools.

articles.title: How to choose a mattress: the features worth paying for – and the ones that aren't
articles.author: Jane Hoskyn
articles.summary: The article reviews various mattress types and brands, including pocket sprung mattresses from Ikea (Valevåg), memory foam mattresses from Nectar, and hybrid mattresses from Otty. Nectar offers a 365-day trial for their memory foam mattress, and Otty's original hybrid mattress is highlighted for its comfort, motion isolation, and breathability.

articles.title: Introducing Byte by Yum!™, an AI-Driven Restaurant Technology Platform Powering Customer and Team Member Experiences Worldwide
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Yum! Brands, Inc. introduced Byte by Yum!, a suite of proprietary AI-driven SaaS products. This service is designed to enhance customer experience, streamline operations, and empower teams across KFC, Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, and Habit Burger & Grill restaurants globally.

articles.title: India food delivery platform Zomato to rebrand as 'Eternal', unveils new logo
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Zomato, the Indian food and grocery delivery platform, is rebranding its company name to 'Eternal'. Along with the name change, Zomato unveiled a new logo for the company.

articles.title: The Great Gadget Giveaway Part 3: Win a new Android Tablet
articles.author: The Argus Staff
articles.summary: A new Android Tablet is launching with features like a high-resolution display, long battery life, sleek design, and AI productivity tools. There is a competition to win one, with entries closing on February 19, 2025.

articles.title: I drove a Hyundai Ioniq 5 N. These 11 features make it one of the ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Hyundai introduced the Ioniq 5 N, a new high-performance variant of their compact EV SUV. The 2025 Ioniq 5 N is available in an eye-catching "Soultronic Orange" color.

articles.title: 'Stylish' £70 Next dress that shopper says 'will 'turn heads'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is selling the Cape Detail Maxi Dress, a polyester dress featuring a leg slit and available in various colors. Customer reviews describe it as a flattering dress that enhances the wearer's figure. Shoppers report receiving many compliments while wearing the dress.

articles.title: 'Why Are You The CEO?' Lenskart CEO Peyush Bansal Asks A Female Entrepreneur, Her Response Secured A Deal With Anupam Mittal
articles.summary: Rahul Tyagi and Samiksha Yadav pitched their innovative undergarment liquid detergent on Shark Tank India, seeking Rs 50 lakh for 2.5% equity. Anupam Mittal eventually invested Rs 50 lakh for 4% stake in the company, aligning with their vision. The product is tailored for hand laundry and caters to feminine hygiene.

articles.title: Do smart video doorbells need a chime to work properly?
articles.author: Alistair Charlton
articles.summary: Ring, Nest, and Yale produce smart video doorbells that alert residents via smartphone applications instead of traditional bells. While these doorbells don't typically include a chime, companies like Ring offer separate wireless chimes, such as the Ring Chime Pro, which also functions as a nightlight and Wi-Fi extender. Nest Doorbell (wired) can connect to existing chimes, while other video doorbells use existing wiring for power, often requiring separate chime purchase for the 'ding-dong' sound.

articles.title: The Great Gadget Giveaway Part 3: Win a new Android Tablet
articles.summary: A competition offers a chance to win a brand-new Android Tablet featuring a high-resolution display, long battery life, sleek design, and AI/productivity features. The tablet is promoted for work, entertainment, or as a gift.

articles.title: InMoment Unveils Cutting-Edge AI-Powered Competitor Intelligence for Reputation Management
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: InMoment launched its Competitor Intelligence solution on February 6, 2025. This new tool utilizes generative AI to synthesize competitor review data, offering businesses insights into competitors' strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats. The solution is designed to improve reputation management by providing targeted answers and granular filters, enabling users to quickly understand competitor performance and differentiate themselves.

articles.title: The HONOR X9c Unbreakable AI Smartphone
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: HONOR is launching the HONOR X9c Unbreakable AI Smartphone in South Africa. The new smartphone features drop-resistant technology, is engineered for extreme climates, and has a three-layer waterproof system with an IP65M water and dust resistance rating. The HONOR X9c Unbreakable AI Smartphone also integrates AI-enhanced performance.

articles.title: Concept PR unveils AI-led digital initiative Concept X
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Concept PR launched Concept X, an AI-led digital initiative, to offer clients integrated digital solutions. Concept X aims to enhance reputation building through data-driven strategies, leveraging advanced tools for content creation and targeting.

articles.title: Living in Archway: transport links, parking, schools, best streets — and the average cost of monthly rent
articles.author: Prudence Ivey
articles.summary: TUI offers £200 off bookings over £2000 with a voucher code. ASOS provides 10% off first orders above £20 with a promo code. Cult Beauty gives 15% off orders exceeding £25 with a discount code. Travelodge provides 5% off bookings through discount code. Currys is providing at least 30% off on tablets including iPads.

articles.title: Aldi releases £7 perfume that people say smells like Gucci for Valentine's Day
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi's Lacura beauty brand is launching three new fragrances inspired by Gucci Flora, priced at £6.99 each. These scents, named Blush Bouquet, Meadow Bouquet, and Spring Bouquet, offer Italian-inspired floral fragrances at an affordable alternative to designer perfumes. The new scents will be joining returning fan favourites inspired by Prada, YSL, Tom Ford and Giorgio Armani.

articles.title: ChatGPT maker OpenAI now has a new logo. Here's how it looks like
articles.summary: OpenAI is rebranding, introducing a new typeface called OpenAI Sans and updating its logos. OpenAI Sans is available in five weights and is designed for both precision and approachability. The blossom logo has also been refined to align with the new brand identity.

articles.title: Marks & Spencer has a £40 dress that reminds shoppers of 'Julia Roberts in Pretty Woman'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is offering the Round Neck Spot Print Midaxi Tea Dress for £39.50. This dress, available in sizes 8-24 and various lengths, has received positive customer reviews praising its style and versatility.

articles.title: The big hit from Papa John's has arrived – and the hype is justified
articles.summary: Papa John's introduced Papadias, a pizza-quesadilla mashup, in four versions. Sugat expanded into ready-to-eat canned foods. Yehiam Delicacies launched Milano Salami, a classic Italian-style beef salami. JO-MO launched vegan-certified protein bars in three flavors. Tnuva expanded its functional beverage line with Collagen Boost and Extra Turmeric Boost shots.

articles.title: 'Powerful' pressure washer that 'obliterates dirt' is under £70 in Amazon sale
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Bosch EasyAquatak 110 High-Pressure Washer to £67, highlighting its features like three nozzles for various cleaning tasks. Argos also offers the Black + Decker Vertical Pressure Washer at its lowest price of £57, featuring self-priming capabilities.

articles.title: Lucky Motors opens bookings for Kia Sportage L, starting at Rs9.49 million
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: Lucky Motors has launched the Kia Sportage L in Pakistan, offering three variants with prices starting at PKR 9,499,000. The SUV features various customization options and comes with a 4-year warranty, with an extended warranty for the hybrid variant's battery.

articles.title: Is The Škoda Kylaq Your Next Ride?  2025 Skoda Kylaq  First Drive Review  Urban SUV
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Skoda is introducing the 2025 Skoda Kylaq, an urban SUV. News18 provides a first drive review of this vehicle.

articles.title: What's China's answer to the Mazda CX-5 like?
articles.author: Dom Tripolone
articles.summary: MG has launched the 2025 MG HS, a mid-size SUV with updated styling and improved features. Priced competitively, the HS offers a 10-year warranty but lacks hybrid or all-wheel-drive options currently.

articles.title: ASUS's Zenfone 12 Ultra leans heavily into AI
articles.author: Jeremy Gan
articles.summary: ASUS has announced its new flagship smartphone, the Zenfone 12 Ultra, featuring AI capabilities powered by Meta's Llama 3 and a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. The Zenfone 12 Ultra is available in Europe for €1,099.99, with a limited-time launch offer of €999.99 from February 6 to 28 and has a 5,500mAh battery.

articles.title: LG Introduces Latest WebOS Upgrade Smart TV
articles.author: Leadership News
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching the latest webOS smart TV platform upgrade for older LG 4k and 8k Smart TVs. This upgrade provides users with a personalized and customizable Home Screen, improved user interface with Quick Card UI for easy content access, and enhanced security features.

articles.title: Shark Tank India 4: Peyush Bansal questions female founder Samiksha Yadav ‘why are you the CEO?' the latter replies ‘Because I deserve'
articles.author: etimes.in
articles.summary: Rahul Tyagi and Samiksha Yadav pitched their new product, India's first undergarment liquid wash, on Shark Tank India 4, seeking ₹50 lakh for 2.5% equity. Anupam Mittal offered ₹50 lakh for 5% equity and the founders accepted, securing a deal for their product.

articles.title: Samsung S25 Ultra: Sticking to the tried and tested reduces incentive to upgrade
articles.author: Ciara O'Brien
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy S25 Ultra, its new flagship device, featuring AI-powered features, a high-powered camera with enhanced zoom capabilities, and a 6.9-inch display. The S25 Ultra also includes new software features such as audio eraser for videos and AI integration for tasks like calendar event creation, although the S Pen has lost its Bluetooth functionality.

articles.title: RankBot.ai Unveils AI Agent for Automated and Affordable SEO
articles.author: Huntsville
articles.summary: RankBot has launched its AI-powered SEO platform designed to simplify and enhance search rankings. The platform offers AI-generated backlinks, keyword tracking, and on-page optimization. RankBot aims to make SEO more accessible, scalable, and affordable for businesses of all sizes.

articles.title: RankBot.ai Unveils AI Agent for Automated and Affordable SEO
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: RankBot launches an AI-powered SEO platform that automates ranking with high-quality backlinks and optimized content. The platform offers AI-generated backlinks, on-page SEO optimization, and keyword tracking to simplify and enhance search engine rankings for businesses of all sizes. RankBot aims to democratize SEO with AI, making it more accessible, scalable, and affordable.

articles.title: Google Adverts Unveil Features For Businesses To Measure Performance
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Google has updated its Demand Gen platform, launched in 2023, to improve business performance on YouTube and Google's visual surfaces. The updates aim to assist businesses in building stronger engagement with potential customers and increasing online sales and leads.

articles.title: LG smart TVs to get webOS upgrade for a fresh, new experience
articles.author: Abubakar Yunusa
articles.summary: LG Electronics (LG) is providing an upgrade of the webOS smart TV platform to owners of older LG 4k and 8k Smart TVs. The WebOS Renew program aims to enhance the user experience on LG smart TVs.

articles.title: NHL Players Talk In-Season Tournament, Worst Coaches, Facilities in Anonymous Poll
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Google has rolled out a series of updates to its Demand Gen platform designed to help businesses improve performance across YouTube and Google's visual surfaces. LG Electronics donated a solar-powered borehole to the Ayeye Community in Ibadan, Oyo State, aiming to address water scarcity.

articles.title: Grok AI chatbot app is now coming to Android- Here's everything you need to know
articles.summary: xAI has launched its Grok AI chatbot app on Android, expanding its availability beyond iOS. The Grok app, already listed on the Google Play Store for pre-registration, offers AI-based conversation, image generation, and real-time information access and will be free to use.

articles.title: Surprise in store with purchase of 10,000th sprayer
articles.author: McPherson Media Group
articles.summary: Richard McKay purchased a new John Deere 616R Self-Propelled Sprayer.

articles.title: Don Quijote owners to open Don Don Donki Kapolei next week
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: Don Don Donki operators are launching a new Don Don Donki Kapolei store. This store will differ from existing Don Quijote locations.

articles.title: The Minimal Phone：極簡主義的烏托邦，還是曇花一現的情懷？
articles.author: 新浪網
articles.summary: The Minimal Phone, a retro-designed phone with a physical keyboard and e-ink screen, has entered the shipping phase after successful crowdfunding. Similarly, The Light Phone III, featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon processor and AMOLED black and white display, is scheduled for release in January 2025. Both phones aim to offer a minimalist digital experience, though their limitations may lead users to require additional smartphones.

articles.title: Beware: Viewing The 34 Things On This List May Lead To Permanent Heart Eyes
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article highlights various newly launched products available for purchase, featuring items like LED lightsaber chopsticks, aromatherapy gemstone soaps, Liquipens, paw-shaped chair cushions, and glittery gel nail polishes. These products are offered on platforms like Amazon and Etsy, showcasing innovative designs and functionalities to enhance everyday experiences.

articles.title: Google Adverts Unveil Features For Businesses To Measure Performance
articles.author: Abolaji Adebayo
articles.summary: Google has released updates to its Demand Gen platform, launched in 2023, enhancing performance across YouTube and other Google visual surfaces. The updates include expanding control over ad placements, improving creative capabilities with 9:16 vertical ads for YouTube Shorts, streamlining ad creation, offering product feeds for retailers, and introducing enhanced reporting features. Video action campaigns will transition to Demand Gen by mid-2025.

articles.title: The best mattresses: sleep better with our six rigorously tested picks
articles.author: The Guardian
articles.summary: Simba and Otty mattresses are recommended, covering both luxury and budget options.

articles.title: Zoftware simplifies software selection with AI-powered innovation
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: Zoftware launched its AI-driven software marketplace designed to simplify software selection for businesses. The platform offers tailored recommendations and real-time tech support using artificial intelligence, combining predictive AI with customer insights to deliver tailored solutions.

articles.title: Kanye West just introduced the cheapest Yeezy shoes ever - Prepare to be shocked by the price!
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: YZY brand unveiled the Yeezy SLPR, a new footwear model, for $20. This follows the release of the Yeezy Pods, a long sock with rubber traction pods.

articles.title: Want to rent a $300,000 AMD MI300A supercomputer for free for seven days? Gigabyte wants ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Gigabyte is launching Gigabyte Launchpad. The Launchpad will review projects for innovation and commercial value.

articles.title: Smoothie Bar Infusions New Product Launch
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A company is launching a new product called 'Infusions' which are advanced consumption devices. The company focuses on innovation and quality to set a new standard for consumer experiences across California.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Ultra in-depth review – while it's a great phone, its AI is underwhelming
articles.author: Irish Independent
articles.summary: Samsung is keeping up with technology by launching its latest product, the Galaxy S25 Ultra.

articles.title: Hey Dude launches wacky limited edition 90s-inspired Furby footwear collection
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Hey Dude launched a new Furby footwear collection. The collection features two bold designs combining nostalgia and cosiness, aiming to appeal to Furby fans.

articles.title: Amazon drops unsubtle hints that Alexa AI is landing soon – 3 things to expect ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Amazon is preparing to unveil an update to its Alexa service at an upcoming tech event. Rumors suggest the update will include new functionalities and improvements.

articles.title: OpenAI's rebrand tries to tap into the emotional side of AI
articles.author: Fast Company
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT is characterized by its typography, defining the user interaction with the AI model. Typography is the primary point of contact for users interacting with the AI for the first time.

articles.title: SUBARU INTRODUCES 2025 FORESTER e-BOXER HYBRID
articles.author: Victoria Advocate
articles.summary: Subaru is introducing a next-generation series-parallel e-BOXER hybrid system. The new system incorporates a newly developed 2.5-litre BOXER engine.

articles.title: Nvidia GeForce Now is currently sold out — here's when it's coming back
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nvidia GeForce Now, a game streaming service, is currently unavailable for new sign-ups due to high demand. However, Nvidia plans to relaunch the service in approximately two weeks, introducing a new 'Day Pass' option.

articles.title: A New Era Unfolds: How the Triple Foldable Smartphone Disrupted the Industry
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Huawei introduced the first triple foldable smartphone. The product received significant attention, amassing 3 million.

articles.title: OutSystems Releases Mentor AI Tool
articles.summary: OutSystems has launched Mentor, an AI digital worker on OutSystems Developer Cloud (ODC). Mentor generates applications from prompts or documents and automates the software development lifecycle (SDLC). Early adopters like Thermo Fisher and KPMG reported significant time savings and efficiency gains using Mentor, including rapid app generation and streamlined workflows.

articles.title: Perfect Valentine's Day Gifts: Luxurious Picks for Your Loved One
articles.author: Team Indulge
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products and services, including Ayurvedic Sutra with Vayas Sutra anti-ageing cream, Lancôme with Lip Idôle Squalane-12 ButterGlow lip balm, Ikonic with Slim Titanium Crimp 2.0 styling tool, ClayCo with SunGlaze Water-Gel Sunscreen, Radiance by Forever with a skincare range, Moroccanoil with a Body Travel Kit, Neutriderm with Illuminating Body Lotion, YSL with MYSLF fragrance, iluvia with Repair Reviver Curl Care System, and Mintree with a skincare line.
